name: Fiona

projects.title: Extractify
projects.longDescription: Next.js application that uses advanced AI/ML techniques to extract structured data from unstructured conversation text. Provides an intuitive interface for uploading conversation files or inputting text directly to extract key information like email addresses, phone numbers, ZIP codes, and order IDs.

projects.title: Portfolio Anomaly Detector (PAD)
projects.longDescription: Portfolio Anomaly Detector is a mobile application designed specifically for Hong Kong retail investors who actively trade US/HK stocks. Because the US market trades from 9:30 PM to 4:00 AM Hong Kong time, many investors wake up to large overnight gaps, either painful drawdowns or missed buying opportunities.

projects.title: NLP Financial Chatbot
projects.longDescription: Builds an intelligent chatbot that enables non-technical users to query financial data (e.g., trial balances) in plain English. It integrates data preprocessing, semantic entity linking, text-to-SQL generation (via BERT + PICARD), and natural-language answer generation, all in a single neural pipeline.

projects.title: RoadBuddy
projects.longDescription: RoadBuddy is a ride-sharing application designed to connect drivers with passengers traveling in the same direction. Unlike traditional services like Uber, RoadBuddy focuses on drivers who are already planning to travel to a specific destination, allowing them to offer available seats to passengers heading the same way. This approach promotes cost efficiency by enabling passengers to share travel expenses while allowing drivers to earn extra cash on trips they were already planning to take.

services.title: International Software Engineering Internship
services.description: Designed the frontend and developed the backend for an AI phone call system at a Tokyo, Japan startup using Python, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and Figma.

services.title: Leading AI-Human Interaction Research Presentation
services.description: Presented peer-reviewed research at the UCSC Psi Chi Symposium on AI speech errors and emotional responses.

services.title: Cornell Tech - Break Through Tech AI Fellowship
services.description: Selected from ~3,600 applicants for a year-long AI/ML fellowship focused on real-world applications and AI fairness.

services.title: University Club Leadership & Workshop Development
services.description: Co-founded and served as Internal Vice President of UC Santa Cruz Blueprint, leading web and mobile app projects for nonprofits.

aboutpara: Hello! I'm a Computer Science and Cognitive Science new graduate from UCSC, double majoring with a focus on Human-Computer Interaction. I've always been curious about how people think and how technology can better support that thinking, so I've gravitated toward projects that blend psychology, design, and engineering. I love collaborating with teams that value thoughtful design, accessible tech, and meaningful user experiences. If you're working on something that lives at the intersection of AI, UX, and impact, or just want to connect, I'd love to chat!
